name: Lil BUB’s 10th Birthday
socialShareText: To celebrate Lil BUB’s 10th BUBirthday, we are raising money for special needs pets. Your single contribution will benefit these five amazing 501(c)(3) charities close to BUB’s heart!
about: To celebrate Lil BUB’s 10th BUBirthday, we are raising money for special needs pets. Your single contribution will benefit these five amazing 501(c)(3) charities close to BUB’s heart!

sponsor.description: We will contribute an extra donation on top of yours, to the same value (up to $25 per donation). These matching funds are kindly provided by Every.org up to a total value of $10,000

nonprofits.name: Lil BUB's Big Fund
nonprofits.about: Lil BUB is a one of a kind space cat. Since landing on Earth, she's raised over $500,000 for homeless pets.

nonprofits.name: Feral Change
nonprofits.about: Registered 501(c)(3) dedicated to helping Oakland control and manage its feral and homeless cat population.

nonprofits.name: Waggle Crowdfunding for Pets
nonprofits.about: First-of-its kind life-saving platform to help pet guardians and veterinary professionals raise funds for pets in crisis.

nonprofits.name: Orphan Kitten Club
nonprofits.about: Dedicated to saving the lives of the tiniest felines.

nonprofits.name: The Jackson Galaxy Project
nonprofits.about: The Jackson Galaxy Project is a program of Greater Good Charities that helps animals and the people who care for them.
